subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez stood and admired his second homer of the game as it flew into the right-center-field bleachers in the eighth inning to help the Boston Red Sox to an 8-7 victory against the Seattle Mariners last night at Fenway Park.
snippet: Manny Ramírez stood and admired his second homer of the game as it flew into the right-center-field bleachers in the eighth inning to help the Boston Red Sox to an 8-7 victory against the Seattle Mariners last night at Fenway Park.
